body: @onthebiway that's not true. NTR is as popular among boys as it's among womans. Not every NTR is made with womans in mind, and sometimes the author hardly thing about how to satisfy their female audience, they just do what they want. It's also debatable if NTR is really that popular, since most people use a single survey made by a single hentai site, as argument, but  we don't what were the options people had in this survey, and we don'tknow how this survey was conducted, there were ways to vote more than one time? Was romance or other more heartwarming tags available options? How many womans participated in this survey? We don't know. Also in other surveys NTR didn't show itself as being so popular. Like in a survey made by another hentai site, but this using Japan prefectures as the basis, we saw that tags like shota are more popular in some prefectures than NTR. So is debatable if NTR really is the most popular genre among womans, or if it's just a popular genre among fanza users
